title: Drawing, "Design for Quiet May Boil", early 20th century
medium:
Graphite, orange pencil, Ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper
markings: Stamps: Architect's stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower center: SC1-4 BOILER UNIT; at lower right: SCALE 1 1/2"=1'-0" Inscribed in graphite in architect's stamp: 6160; 1 1/2"=1'-0"/ QUIET MAY; E.W. / 3/26/34; 3/26/34 Inscribed in orange pencil with dimensions throughout

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Quiet May Boil", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite, orange pencil, Ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-224.
